Title: Deconstructing Harry
Actors: Judy Davis, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Stephanie Roth Haberle, Dan Frazer
Plot: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
